title: IRS gearbox for sale for split bus

posts.content: I have 2 DC coded IRS gearboxes which have been dry stored for a few years....DC gearboxes were fitted in 1500/1600 IRS Type 3's from 8/68 with the same final drive gear 4.125 as the AH gearbox from 1302's.....These boxes make ideal donors for IRS conversions for splits,you will need to change the hockey stick over.......Â£175 each or trade if its something interesting/original accessories and I can possibly help with delivery too....Thanks
